title: Add Google AdSense script tag to HTML head

requirements.text: Add the Google AdSense script tag `<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-2965680356233756" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>` inside the `<head>` element of `frontend/index.html`. This is the single HTML entry point for the React SPA, so adding it there covers all pages.

quotes: copy and paste this code between the <head></head> tags on each page of our site.<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-2965680356233756" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

acceptanceCriteria: The AdSense `<script>` tag with `client=ca-pub-2965680356233756` is present inside `<head>` in `frontend/index.html`.
The script tag includes both the `async` attribute and `crossorigin="anonymous"` attribute.
No existing head content (meta tags, title, other scripts) is removed or altered.
The app still loads and renders correctly after the change.

constraints: Do not modify any backend files.
Do not alter any existing head tags, meta tags, or other scripts already present in frontend/index.html.
Use the exact AdSense publisher ID: ca-pub-2965680356233756.
nonGoals: Adding or modifying AdBanner component placements on any page.
Creating new ad units or ad slot configurations.
